data.headline: Private foundations
data.summary: An exploration of the significant economic impact of private foundations in Arkansas, revealing the vast assets they control and their contributions to societal needs.

data.headline: Money talks in Russia
data.summary: An insight into the availability and potential misuse of easily accessible Russian databases, illustrating concerns around privacy and data security.

data.headline: Fund-raising expenses
data.summary: Investigation into discrepancies in fund-raising expenses reported by large nonprofits, uncovering a pattern of missing or misreported financial data.

data.headline: Boot camp lessons
data.summary: Lessons in using computer-assisted reporting for analyzing city employee salaries, learning the importance of thorough preparation and negotiation skills.

data.headline: Doctors and damages
data.summary: A dive into the challenges of using the National Practitioner Data Bank to investigate adverse actions against doctors, highlighting the complexities of medical accountability.

data.headline: Racial health gap
data.summary: A detailed analysis of racial disparities in health outcomes in the U.S., showcasing geographical disparities and systemic health inequities.

data.headline: Disciplinary records
data.summary: Research on the accessibility and analysis of university disciplinary records under public records law, revealing university transparency issues.
